comment.author: 45618415@N05
comment._content: The location for this Church is a little off - it's not in Chapeltown (where there is a Catholic Church) but is in fact the Church of Ireland Church of St John the Baptist, Kniightstown, Valentia. maps.google.com/maps?q=Valentia,+Ireland&hl=en&ll... The building in the background is the parsonage.

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: The Church dates from 1860, and the Parsonage (same as a Glebe house, right?) from 1873.
